description: Head turning strapless belted little red satin dress!

Sweetheart strapless short dress accented with a brooch like embellishment on waist. This dress features a right hand secret pocket. Color: Coral, Pool, V-Lilac Size : 4-24 This special occasion dress is returnable. Please refer to our special occasion dress return policy (click here) for more details..

This glamorous strapless dress radiates luxury with its intricate gold sequins and beaded detailing. The fitted silhouette, combined with shimmering zigzag patterns, creates a dazzling effect that accentuates the figure beautifully. The subtle sparkle of the beads, paired with the elegant gold base, makes this dress perfect for upscale events, cocktail parties, or a red-carpet appearance. Its timeless design and sophisticated embellishments make it a true show-stopper, offering both grace and boldness.
This floor length, stunning off shoulder dress with chiffon overlay comes in a variety of colors

Fully bedazzled, off shoulder, one sleeve dress! Beautiful detail on mesh sleeve to give that floating gem appearance! Two colors. Elegant and alluring, this sophisticated cocktail dress by Milano Formals E1510 is ready to shine at any event. You will be fascinated with the shining vivid jeweled embellishments that are stitched all over the dress, including down its long, sheer single sleeve. The curved asymmetric neckline and simple short skirt come together to framed this unforgettable look.
Fully roached strapless cocktail dress with belted accent! Two colors (Black and Red). This short, rouched, strapless  dress has a Zipper closure. The main fabric is Chiffon.
Short, Strapless, sweetheart neckline pleated chiffon dress

One shoulder Roached cocktail dress complete with floral accent satin belt. Three colors (Black, Red, Purple). Walk like a goddess in Milano Formals E1581. A one-shoulder party dress fashioned in asymmetrical pleats of chiffon layers creating a tightly fitting bodice and well defined hipline complimenting the fitted mini-skirt. Defining the waistline is a satin waistband with floral accents and embellishment. Perfect for homecoming, date-night or junior-prom.
This jawdropping black illusion dress is a showstopper.  The sheer back is accented with a floral design.  The fabric is stretchy to hug all over your curves.

Jaw-dropping cocktail dress with fully see-through back accented with floral design. The front bodice is fully bedazzled with sequins.

Capture everyones attention with this fully sequin gown.  The illusion slit from the bust down to the floor gives an edgy look.  The back of the dress fastens at the base of the neck connecting the matching illusion fabric.
Feel like a princess in this fully beaded illusion bodice with a halter neckline and full skirt.
Get noticed with this fully beaded cocktail dress with zipper enclosure.
Turn heads with this red fully beaded halter crop top and floor-length taffeta skirt.  The skirt has a matching beaded "belt" to beautifully tie this set together!

Preen and sashay your way to the top with this gorgeous dress from Milano Formals E2027. Displaying a pop of surprise with its skin toned mesh midriff panel, this piece displays a bateau neckline, closed back and a daintily beaded bodice. Lining its waist is a band of beautifully sewn beadwork, the skirt then flows into a swirly mini hem perfect in showcasing those lovely stilettoes.
Elegant yet sexy floor length black dress with illusion slits up the leg and racerback cut will have all eyes on you at your next event.

Look stunning in this vogue cocktail dress by Milano Formals E2034. The dress features a sleeveless crop top with high neckline and a sheer fabric over the sweetheart liner. The fitted bodice is richly decorated in bead embellishments with an open back centered closure. The skirt is highlighted by bead ornate around the band and tapers through the thighs for that figure flatting silhouette. T

This ice blue fully beaded 2-piece ensemble gives a "frozen" look perfect for any holiday party.

Walk in glamour and let all heads turn on you in this creation by Milano Formals E2042. The dress showcases a sleeveless scoop neckline with lace ornate that that splays to the front, sides and at the open back centered closure. The fitted bodice features princess seams that flows to the skirt that tapers the thighs and gently flares in floor length hem.
This long dress showcases an off the shoulder with ruched bodice. The full length A-line skirt has slant pockets for that trendy style.

Dress to impress on your next formal event in this simple but captivating dress by Milano Formals E2053. This dress parades in a sleeveless scooped neckline overlaid by lace embellishments that spreads to the cutouts at the back. The dress is framed with a band where the A-line skirt flourishes to the floor. This Milano Formals dress is sure to give the classic vibe that works for many special occasions.

Make your presence known with this elegant bedazzled Milano Formals E2060 piece. This alluring gown features a halter top neckline speckled with meticulously woven geometric beads on a skin-tone bodice. Midriff cutouts are immaculately displayed on the gown to add a flirty feel to the overall look. The beaded waistband wraps around the its silhouette as it flawlessly transitions into the sexy open back. Cease from sharing the spotlight with this Milano Formals beaded gown.
Look beautifully elegant in this floor-length gown with a crocheted lace overlay.

This two-piece ensemble is sure to turn heads with its fully beaded halter style top and matching beaded belt sewn onto the skirt! Render your girlfriends speechless with this elaborately designed Milano Formals E2075 two-piece cocktail dress. Speak volumes of sassiness with this ensemble\x92s high halter neckline, sexy crop top cut and flowy Mikado flare skirt. Its chevron patterned bodice is meticulously encrusted with dazzling beads that reflects the light at every turn. The iridescent beadwork is also mirrored on both neck and waistband details.

Appear tailored to perfection with this Milano Formal E2080 go-to black dress with a twist. This gown flaunts a modest scoop neckline and closed back. Its sexy twist is showcased by the bejeweled straps exposed by its sexy midriff cutouts and its form-hugging silhouette

This stunner showcases a modest bateau neckline that transitions to a sexy V-shaped open back. Highlighting its silhouette are the creatively ruched detail that accentuates the waistline and the seamless tapering of its satin fabric to form a lovely fitted shape.

Unleash the vixen in you with this flattering jersey evening dress by Milano Formals 2101. Sexy yet classy, this piece has a halter neckline and racer open back for that much-needed oomph. The bodice has a stunning midriff cutout that slowly transitions to its ribbon banded waist. The fitted skirt flows down flawlessly to a sweep of train

2107. The dress features a sleeveless bead embellished halter neckline with cutouts throughout the bodice and at the back.
